name: GetMeetingSummary
description:
Retrieve the summary of a Zoom meeting or webinar.

Use this tool to get a summary of a Zoom meeting or webinar. Suitable for hosts with Pro, Business, or higher subscription plans who have enabled the appropriate settings. Does not support E2EE meetings.

parameters.name: meeting_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the meeting or webinar. If it begins with a '/' or contains '//', double-encode before use.

value_schema.description: The meeting's universally unique ID (UUID). When you provide a meeting UUID that begins with a `/` character or contains the `//` characters, you **must** double-encode the meeting UUID before making an API request.
